0.Instruction: Perform opposition (touch the pads of your thumb and index finger) between your thumb and index finger.

1.Instruction: Try the same opposition with your thumb and middle finger.

2.Instruction: Next, try the opposition with your thumb and ring finger.

3.Instruction: Attempt the opposition with your thumb and pinkie finger.

4.Instruction: Use your thumb and index finger to pick up the handle of the spoon and drop it into your pink box.

5.Instruction: Repeat the same process with a fork, using your thumb and index finger. If the fork is a bit heavy, use your middle finger together with your thumb and index finger to form a tripod grasp.

6.Instruction: Drop the fork into the container.
